title: Judge: California's women on boards law is unconstitutional - The Associated Press
content:
1. Judge: California's women on boards law is unconstitutional  The Associated Press
  2. LA judge rules Calif. law requiring women on corporate boards is unconstitutional  CBS Los Angeles
  3. Judge: California's women on boards law is unconstitutional  SFGATE
  4. Judge rules California law requiring women on corporate boards violates men’s constitutional rights  San Francisco Chronicle
  5. California court strikes down another law seeking to diversify corporate boards  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — A Los Angeles judge has ruled that California’s landmark law requiring women on corporate boards is unconstitutional. Superior Court Judge Maureen Duffy-Lewis said the law that would have required boards have up to three female directors by this year violated the right to equal treatment.
